thread.title: BRIEF-Huafon Microfibre Shanghai proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Huafon Microfibre Shanghai proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

organizations.name: reuters) - huafon microfibre shanghai co ltd

text:
Feb 27(Reuters) - Huafon Microfibre Shanghai Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s chairman proposed to pay a cash dividend of 0.5 yuan for every 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 8 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for 2017
